title: The recreational open space required to be provided in the lands allotted outside the Action area shall be as per the relevant clause of the Agreement to lease or as per these regulations (UDCPR), whichever is more
clause_text: The recreational open space required to be provided in the lands allotted outside the Action area shall be as per the relevant clause of the Agreement to lease or as per these regulations (UDCPR), whichever is more.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
